Is it possible to have multiple Battle Specials inherited via Disc Chips?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Is it possible to have multiple Battle Specials inherited via Disc Chips?
By Zekira G. Drake on Saturday, March 2, 2013 - 06:24 pm:

Maybe through generations or something? I was thinking of giving my monsters Grit, Fury, and Hurry but those require 3 different chips.

I was thinking of something like: I'll raise 2 different Pulsars for a while using just a modified HAD, combining non-trained monsters just for the specials and train them in as much stats and tech chains I could, then combine them later to make another Pulsar which I will then inherit the last battle special, and use the DP method on it.

Sorry if this was answered somewhere already; I couldn't find info about Battle Specials passing via generations anywhere.
